SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-I Feel Tense or Wound Up
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel tense or 'wound up.'
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Feel Tense or Wound Up

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-Enjoy the Things I Used to Enjoy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I still enjoy the things I used to enjoy.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Still Enjoy the Things I Used to Enjoy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get a sort of frightened feeling as if something awful is about to happen.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Get a Frightened Feeling Something Awful is About to Happen

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-I Can Laugh and See Funny Side
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can laugh and see the funny side of things.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Can Laugh and See Funny Side of Things

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Worrying thoughts go through my mind.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - Worrying Thoughts Go Through My Mind

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel cheerful.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-Sit at Ease and Feel Relaxed
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can sit at ease and feel relaxed.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Can Sit at Ease and Feel Relaxed

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-I Feel as if I am Slowed Down
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel as if I am slowed down.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Feel as if I am Slowed Down

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get a sort of frightened feeling like 'butterflies' in the stomach.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Get Frightened Feeling Like Butterflies in the Stomach

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I have lost interest in my appearance.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Have Lost Interest in My Appearance

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-Feel Restless be on the Move
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel restless as if I have to be on the move.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Feel Restless as if I Have to be on the Move

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I look forward with enjoyment to things.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Look Forward with Enjoyment to Things

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HADS01-I Get Sudden Feelings of Panic
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get sudden feelings of panic.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Get Sudden Feelings of Panic

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can enjoy a good book or radio or television programme.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HADS - I Can Enjoy a Good Book or Radio or Television Programme

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Total score anxiety.
Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Total score depression.
